p.k: The Wattersons are swapping scary stories on a family vacation, when their car breaks down in the middle of the desert. / Gumball is in such a bad mood that it spreads to Darwin, who joins him in complaining about everything. / Nothing much is happening for Gumball and Darwin and the background characters in Elmore seize their moment. / When Mum reveals that Gumball's real name is "Zach", Gumball adopts a cheesy, annoying persona to match the name. / The kids finally get the puppy they always wanted, except itâ€™s a turtle. / The secret behind Anton's immortality. / The new coach at Elmore High stands up to Jamie. / Sarah, the new kid in school, is Gumball and Darwin's number one, slightly obsessive, fan. / Whilst Gumball and Darwin make fun of Mum and Dad for being old, their voices start to break.
